name: Shape!
description:
Let's Shape !

Use your skills to destroy all the enemies shape and collect their fragment to become more powerful !

Controls :

ZQSD / Arrows to move, 1 2 3 (keyboard or numpad) to use skills, LeftClick to shoot.

Credits :

This is my first game in C++, I've learned how to use lib as SFML and ImGui.

Game Design and Programming : 
  • Frédéric Deiber (me)
Music :
  • Alexandr Zhelanov - Cybermatic pulse
  • Matthew Pablo - Red Doors

VFX :
  • Luke.RUSTLTD - Bomb Explosion 8Bit
  • Jesús Lastra - Shooting Sounds
